src:
Susi Pudjiastuti Posting Foto Liburan di Jepang
04 Nov 2019, 16:07 by Bonauli


Susi Pudjiastuti liburan di Yokohama (Susi Pudjiastuti/Twitter)

Yokohama - Setelah tak lagi menjabat Menteri Kelautan dan Perikanan, Susi Pudjiastuti kini liburan ke Jepang. Yokohama yang berlangit biru dan punya lautan indah ia pilih jadi destinasi.Dari akun Twitternya, Susi Pudjiastuti membagikan keseruan liburannya di Jepang bersama sang cucu, Senin (4/11/2019). Unggahan tersebut berisi 4 foto di Pelabuhan Yokohama."Yokohama Jepang, blue sky blue ocean," cuit Susi.Unggahan ini langsung mendapat banyak tanggapan dari netizen. Mereka semua mendoakan agar Susi sehat selalu.

[Gambas:Twitter]

Susi terlihat berdiri di pelabuhan Yokohama bersama sang cucu. Di belakangnya terlihat sebuah kapal pesiar yang sedang bersandar.Yokohama adalah sebuah kota pelabuhan besar di Jepang. Kota ini juga memiliki banyak tempat wisata menarik untuk dikunjungi.

[Gambas:Twitter]


[Gambas:Twitter]

Netizen malah salah fokus. Mereka berkelakar mengingatkan Susi agar jangan sampai menenggelamkan kapal yang ada di belakangnya.

[Gambas:Twitter]

Main ke Jepang yang identik dengan makan ikan ini juga dikomentari oleh warga Twitter. Mereka berpesan supaya Susi tak lupa makan ikan. Seperti semboyan Susi saat menjabat jadi Menteri Kelautan dan Perikanan.

[Gambas:Twitter]

Postingan ini sudah di retweet sampai 691 ribu kali dan disukai oleh 6,2 ribu akun. Sampai berita ini diterbitkan, jumlah retweet dan likesnya terus bertambah.Simak Video "Netizen Dukung Susi Pudjiastuti Jadi Bupati Pandeglang"[Gambas:Video 20detik](bnl/krs)
text:
Susi Pudjiastuti Posting Holiday Photos in Japan
Nov 04 2019, 16:07 by Bonauli


Susi Pudjiastuti vacation in Yokohama (Susi Pudjiastuti / Twitter)

Yokohama - After no longer serving as Minister of Maritime Affairs and Fisheries, Susi Pudjiastuti is now on vacation to Japan. Blue-sky Yokohama and has a beautiful sea he chose to be a destination. From his Twitter account, Susi Pudjiastuti shared the excitement of her vacation in Japan with her grandchild, Monday (11/04/2019). The upload contained 4 photos at the Port of Yokohama. "Yokohama Japan, blue sky blue ocean," cried Susi. This upload immediately received many responses from netizens. They all pray that Susi is always healthy.

[Gambas: Twitter]

Susi was seen standing in the port of Yokohama with her grandchild. Behind him, a cruise ship is leaning. Yokohama is a large port city in Japan. The city also has many interesting tourist attractions to visit.

[Gambas: Twitter]


[Gambas: Twitter]

Netizens instead focused wrong. They joked to remind Susi not to sink the ship behind her.

[Gambas: Twitter]

Main to Japan, which is synonymous with eating fish, was also commented on by Twitter residents. They ordered that Susi would not forget to eat fish. As Susi's motto when serving as Minister of Maritime Affairs and Fisheries.

[Gambas: Twitter]

This post has been retweeted up to 691 thousand times and liked by 6.2 thousand accounts. Until this news is published, the number of retweets and likes continues to grow. Watch Video "Netizens Support Susi Pudjiastuti Become Regent of Pandeglang" [Gambas: Video 20 seconds] (bnl / krs)
